name: DanDan's Strawberry Cream Pie
author: Rhonda Brock Fuller
summary: A wonderfully easy recipe that even my young sister-in-law can make. She isn't the best cook in the world because she is new at it. But her family was impressed when she made this simple pie.
ingredients: ¾ cup sliced fresh strawberries, mashed
directions: Mix cream cheese, white sugar, and vanilla extract in a large bowl until smooth
Stir 3/4 cup mashed strawberries into cream cheese mixture
Beat heavy cream and confectioners' sugar in a glass or metal bowl until stiff peaks form
Lift your beater or whisk straight up: the cream will form sharp peaks
Fold whipped cream into cream cheese mixture until evenly mixed; fold in remaining 1/4 cup sliced strawberries
Spoon strawberry mixture into graham cracker crust
Chill at least 3 hours before serving
